thread.title: 'Resident Evil' Injured Stuntwoman Wakes Up From Coma
thread.title_full: 'Resident Evil' Injured Stuntwoman Wakes Up From Coma

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Resident Evil' Injured Stuntwoman Wakes Up From Coma
text:
Comments The Milla Jovovich stunt double details her horrific injuries following an on-set accident in South Africa last month. 
Olivia Jackson, the stuntwoman who was seriously injured on the set of " Resident Evil: The Final Chapter ", has been out of medically-induced coma. The Milla Jovovich stunt double gave update on her condition on Facebook, detailing her injuries and long road to recovery. She wrote, "2 weeks in a coma, brain bleed, brain swelling, severed main artery in the neck, crushed & degloved face, several broken ribs, paralyzed arm, shattered scapula, broken clavicle, broken humerus, broken radius & ulna, with an open wound and a 7.5 piece of bone missing, amputated thumb, torn fingers, 5 nerves torn out of the spinal cord. ... not my funnest day on set." Olivia was injured during the filming in South Africa last month. She crashed into a piece of metal camera arm when riding a motorcycle at high speed.
